about_the_game:
Ivorfall City is in danger and its up to you to risk it all to save it!

Ivorfall is a steampunk, roguelike, twin-stick shooter where you play as the mysterious and capable Detective Flintlock tasked with taking out hordes of enemies to save Ivorfall city! Fight enemies, modify one of the three gun types in the game to discover a dozen ways to clear through the evil Raven's thugs. Move from level to level collecting weapon mods, spend money in the market on health upgrades, combat items, and weapon mods, and blast your way through boxes, crates, walls, and bank vaults in your quest to uncover the truth.

Gameplay Features:

-Weapon modifications allow for 12 distinct styles of play
-Destructible environments allow players to take on combat challenges in unique ways
-Environmental hazards such as traps put the player on the move
-Variety of gameplay options and varying rarity in weapon mods add to replay-ability

Ivorfall is produced by Inquiry Games LLC, a student game studio from the University of Utah Games program's class of 2024. We hope you enjoy Ivorfall, and that you will support us on our development journey!

Play with Keyboard and Mouse or Xbox Controller!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6600 or AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Prefer SSD
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 8400 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Prefer SSD
